titleStmt.title: Murmurers reproved A sermon preached at St. Vedas [sic], alias Foster-Lane, on Feb. 24. 1688/9. By Marmaduke Hopkins rector there.
titleStmt.author: Hopkins, Marmaduke, d. 1707.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Jonathan Robinson, at the Golden Lion in St. Paul's Church-Yard,

notesStmt.note: Copy lacking a half-title? Text begins on p. 7.
Reproduction of the original in Christ's College Library, Cambridge University.
